channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS, Smart Edge BIOS, ThinkStation BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS, Smart Edge BIOS, ThinkStation BIOS

item.title: CVE-2023-25494|2024-08-02T11:25:18.856Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios%2C%20smart%20edge%20bios%2C%20thinkstation%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability were reported in the BIOS of some Desktop, Smart Edge, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.
